idleLines: Don't worry, I got eternity. Can you say the same?
Ever heard of NFTs? The suits are really out of line nowadays, huh?
Pokemon? I just sell shitty games to snot riddled twerps like you. I don't play them.
Nobody is gonna come to help you once you see me in different circumstances...
Is it fun just sitting there like the fat lard you are?
Don't sympathize with evil. Understanding it may be of use, however.
Speaking ill of another man's hat is dishonorable. Yes, even the red man's.
Sorry, I don't rap. Try your luck on someone else.
No, you can't drink from my head. I know you see the handle but I'm not a mug.
I saw you rapping with strangers, you disgust me.
buyLines: I have nothing to sell you now, bud.
I'm closed for now, come back later.
My shop is unfinished yet, I still have to place some hypercubes here and there.
How can you buy anything without money?
Come back when you're a little more mmmm richer.
If no one want to hear you cry, me neither.
Get out of here, I dont have time to sell things, I need to finish One Piece.
Good try, but I have nothing to sell here, maybe you are in the wrong 'MOD'.
Buy? Does this look like a shop for you?
Didn't you see the 'CLOSED' sign out there?
'The customer is always right', but you aren't.
Only stupid people will ask to buy when theres nothing to sell...
Why do I always get the freaks?
You know... this is kinda funny.
If you're bored go to the right, there might be stuff you'd like.
Haven't you noticed that you have a hole in your pocket?
Lose yourself in the woods, please.
pussyLines: So....you gonna turn off pussy mode or...???
You smell weird, did the mechanics make you piss yourself?
It's alright kid, not everyone's a champ.
You'll be a man one day, just not today, I suppose.
hellLines: Nice knowing you bub, say hi to my mom when you're dead.
I'd say you got this, but you probably don't.
Ha ha... this should be fun to watch.
poorLines: Come back with more green, chump.
You tryna rip me off here, buddy?
I'm trying to run a business here.
